description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin & Chickpea Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pumpkin & Chickpea Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop half the remaining coriander, reserving sprigs to serve and stir through curry. Sprinkle over cashews and coriander sprigs. Serve curry with steamed rice.
